author: takashi
msg: Private function doesn't need ap_ prefix.

author: mnuttall
msg: Aries-1040: Exception during jpa-container shutdown. From a patch by Gert Vanthienen.

author: rvesse
msg: Rework the TDB disk location locking a little and improve test casesto better detect whether they are valid on the platform they are running on (JENA-648)
Also adds a flag for this feature to SystemTDB which is currently off by default until the code and implementation stabilises

author: desruisseaux
msg: Initial port of LogarithmicTransform1D and ExponentialTransform1D.
Will need revision - we may simplify LogarithmicTransform1D by fixing the base to 10 or e,
which are the majority of cases. Other cases can be handled by concatenating a LinearTransform1D.
